content.body: 汪军梁: heya, I don't think there is an ongoing translation effort for Chinese at the moment, but you can start one. I suggest filing an issue at https://github.com/whatwg/dom/issues/new where you indicate where your work will take place and how people can best contact you and then once it's finished we can add a link from the DOM Standard. Does that sound good?

content.body: Domenic: so are cache and blob reads potentially always broken? Seems aborting them might be the least of their problem
content.formatted_body: Domenic: so are cache and blob reads potentially always broken? Seems aborting them might be the least of their problem

org.matrix.msc1767.message.body: Domenic: so are cache and blob reads potentially always broken? Seems aborting them might be the least of their problem
Domenic: so are cache and blob reads potentially always broken? Seems aborting them might be the least of their problem

content.body: Broken in what way?
Domenic: in that nothing enqueues stuff from the cache store or the blob store onto a stream
content.formatted_body: Domenic: in that nothing enqueues stuff from the cache store or the blob store onto a stream

org.matrix.msc1767.message.body: Domenic: in that nothing enqueues stuff from the cache store or the blob store onto a stream
Domenic: in that nothing enqueues stuff from the cache store or the blob store onto a stream

content.body: Uh oh...
Blobs look good: https://w3c.github.io/FileAPI/#readOperation
Because I'd assume that to be somewhat equivalent to network reads, from a high level, and thus also handle aborting there
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: Because I'd assume that to be somewhat equivalent to network reads, from a high level, and thus also handle aborting there

content.body:
I guess the magic for caches is hidden in

> Set storedResponse to the result of selecting a response from the httpCache
content.formatted_body:
I guess the magic for caches is hidden in

Set storedResponse to the result of selecting a response from the httpCache

org.matrix.msc1767.message.body:
I guess the magic for caches is hidden in

> Set storedResponse to the result of selecting a response from the httpCache

I guess the magic for caches is hidden in

content.body: It's assumed that constructs a ReadableStream as part of creating the response.
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: It's assumed that constructs a ReadableStream as part of creating the response.

content.body: Did you mean https://w3c.github.io/FileAPI/#blob-get-stream? Fetch doesn't invoke that though.
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: Did you mean https://w3c.github.io/FileAPI/#blob-get-stream? Fetch doesn't invoke that though.

content.body: Fetch invokes https://w3c.github.io/FileAPI/#readOperation -_-
> Set response’s body to the result of performing the read operation on blob.
content.formatted_body: Set response’s body to the result of performing the read operation on blob.

org.matrix.msc1767.message.body: > Set response’s body to the result of performing the read operation on blob.
Set response’s body to the result of performing the read operation on blob.

content.body: It's... not horrible, just, we need to take out all the FileReader stuff from that
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: It's... not horrible, just, we need to take out all the FileReader stuff from that

content.body: Sorry, my bad. I got thrown off by there being a `FileReader` involved.
content.formatted_body: Sorry, my bad. I got thrown off by there being a FileReader involved.

org.matrix.msc1767.message.body: Sorry, my bad. I got thrown off by there being a `FileReader` involved.
Sorry, my bad. I got thrown off by there being a FileReader involved.

content.body: Yeah.
And it should take some kind of abort signal. :-)
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: And it should take some kind of abort signal. :-)

content.body: Oh, wait, we don't need to use "read operation", we should just use "get stream"
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: Oh, wait, we don't need to use "read operation", we should just use "get stream"

content.body: "read operation" unpacks the stream
Blob handling in "extract" could also use "get stream": https://fetch.spec.whatwg.org/#concept-bodyinit-extract
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: Blob handling in "extract" could also use "get stream": https://fetch.spec.whatwg.org/#concept-bodyinit-extract
